alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Chester; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued May 06 at 7:14PM EDT until May 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 186 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 22 COUNTIES IN PIEDMONT NORTH CAROLINA ALEXANDER CABARRUS CATAWBA CLEVELAND DAVIE GASTON IREDELL LINCOLN MECKLENBURG ROWAN UNION NC IN WESTERN NORTH CAROLINA AVERY BUNCOMBE BURKE CALDWELL HENDERSON MADISON MCDOWELL MITCHELL POLK RUTHERFORD YANCEY IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN UPSTATE SOUTH CAROLINA CHEROKEE CHESTER YORK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADVANCE, ALLENSTAND, ASHEVILLE, ASHFORD, BANNER ELK, BETHLEHEM, BLACK MOUNTAIN, BLACKSTOCK, BURNSVILLE, BUSICK, CANDLER, CATAWBA, CELO, CHARLOTTE, CHESTER, COLUMBUS, CONCORD, CORNWELL, CROUSE, DANA, DYSARTSVILLE, EAST FLAT ROCK, ELLENDALE, ETOWAH, FARMINGTON, FAUST, FERO, FLETCHER, FOREST CITY, FORK CHURCH, GAFFNEY, GASTONIA, GLENWOOD, GRANITE FALLS, GREAT FALLS, HENDERSONVILLE, HICKORY, HIDDENITE, HOT SPRINGS, HUNTERSVILLE, INDIAN TRAIL, INGALLS, KANNAPOLIS, KINGS CREEK, KINGS MOUNTAIN, LENOIR, LINCOLNTON, LUCK, MARION, MARS HILL, MARSHALL, MATTHEWS, MICAVILLE, MILL SPRING, MILLERSVILLE, MOCKSVILLE, MONROE, MOORESVILLE, MORGANTON, NEBO, NEWLAND, NEWTON, PATTERSON, PLEASANT GROVE, POPLAR, RAMSEYTOWN, ROCK HILL, RUTHERFORDTON, SALISBURY, SALUDA, SAWMILLS, SHELBY, SPINDALE, SPRUCE PINE, ST. STEPHENS, STATESVILLE, STONY POINT, SUGAR HILL, SWISS, TAYLORSVILLE, TRINITY, TRYON, TUXEDO, VALDESE, WALNUT, AND WEDDINGTON.
